alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Prowers, southeastern Kiowa and east central Bent Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lamar around 1205 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Granada, Bristol and Hartman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
